author: craig dent
comment: Does what its supposed to do, just a little disappointed by the fact that any pictures set as the background are downscaled to where it can be hard to distinguish what it is. Used the same picture on the default wear 'custom' face and it shows up crystal clear. Hoping this can be improved with an update. Also having the ability to change the background with a gradient would be nice too.
title: Solid app.

author: Lee Hoffhaus
comment: I really enjoy how clean and modern this face looks, but I have 2 concerns that if addressed would make this a 5 star app. 1. If I have to pay 99 cent to change the colors then I would like a "save color profile" option. Then I could easily change from 1 preset to the other. 2. If I want the time, date, and stroke to be the exact same color, it's rather difficult to do so. It would be nice to have a "recently used" color option. If these issues are addressed I would gladly rate the app at 5 stars
title: Clean and simple, but...

author: Adam Lozeau
comment: My only complaint is some cards block the date. If there was an option to raise the time and date up to clear the card, I wouldn't need to swipe the card down to see it.
title: Favorite face for my moto 360

author: Iain Mann
comment: I've been looking for ages for a clean simple digital watchface for my Sony  Smartwatch 3...and at last have now found it with this app.  It's easy to set up and has lots of choices of colours and background.  There's an in-app purchase option for Premium but this is in fact a donation and the free version is the same as the Premium. I've donated anyway because it's a good well-designed app.  The only extra feature I'd like is the ability to change the font size of the time and date...especially the date. Some of us don't have 20-20 vision.

author: Bryan Logan
comment: Would love to be able to select colors by hex code (so they can be consistent), but even still, this is exactly what I was looking for.
title: Nice simplistic face

author: Sandy P
comment: Was very happy to donate for premium, even without extra features, because I have been trying to find a simple, battery saving, but  color adjustable face, with 12 hour time and date, for quite a while.

reply.author: CORE TECHNOLOGY
reply.content:
Hello, Sandy.
Free and Premium is the same. Premium is just donation.

title: Exactly what I've been looking for.

author: dan Bdan
comment: ...can almost get it just right...needs e,dd date imo thanks..and bigger date font
title: very clean and lots of settings

author: jack courtney
comment: Like the app but it make my watch actup
title: Jack

author: Jerome Chang
comment: Nice!
title: Excellent

author: Nadav Zandbank
comment: Great!

author: Eamonn Rea
comment: Excellent watch face! Haven't got into much customisation yet, but it's simple, beautiful and gives me all the information I need about the time and date at a glance. Not quite as good as Chrono watch face, but it's a very close second. I'll be using this as my primary watch face for the coming weeks. Using the Sony SmartWatch 3 and still looks excellent. One quick question I have: Is there a way to display the watch battery percentage and phone battery percentage on the face? I had a quick look through the settings earlier and couldn't see anything.
title: Great watch face!

author: G Baker
comment: I really like this face but it does have some issues now and again when making changes. They aren't always saved properly. And it would be good it there was the option to add phone battery status to the face. Possibly by making the existing watch battery line two separate half circles one for watch one for phone. Or just another circle inside the existing one.
title: Really good most of the time.

author: S J
comment: I have it set up all black with white text. Thanks
title: A+ Watch Face

author: Chris Kang
comment: Really nice!
title: Amazing

author: John Smith
comment: Love it.
title: Great!

author: Roland Newmark
comment: Good app but honestly didn't really like it much more the built in ones on the Moto360. Especially the custom photo one that came with the 360/wear. The people complaining about the companion app just don't realize you do the customization through the wear app.
title: Solid choice

author: Aidan Edwards
comment: All the pictures show one, and my watch is running 5.0 like the update subscription says, but there's still no app.

reply.author: CORE TECHNOLOGY
reply.content:
Hi Adam.
Application has been fixed. Please update.

title: No companion app.

author: Jamie T
comment: I have no way of opening up the companion app or editing any of the settings on the face. I am running the latest updated 5.1 android wear on my lg g watch r and my note 4 does not have any way of opening up. Please fix
title: Strange bug

comment: I'm on 5.0.1, but it won't show up. LG G Watch R.
title: Strange

author: Chad Newman
comment: Looks good and clean. Been using it for months as my go to watch face. I put a custom background and edited the colors to my liking and its all good to go.

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: What is the difference with purchasing the pro version? I bought the pro version and see no difference. :(
title: Very nice

author: Jim Thibault
comment: Very nice
title: Works Smartwatch 3

author: Peter Doesburg
comment: Good customizer with endless options. Would like a preview screen to see what im doing, now its guesswork till it shows up on the watch. What does the updated-paid version add in extra functionality?
title: I like it

author: Michael Dub
comment: Just spent money on the premium version and the app crashes whenever I try to apply a image which is the whole reason why I even considered buying it.  Using a moto 360 on an M8

reply.author: CORE TECHNOLOGY
reply.content:
Hello, Michael.
We've updated the application.
Please try again. :-)

title: Wasted money please fix

author: Ian McCall
comment: Looks absolutely amazing on LG GwR. You won't be disappointed… even when the watch is dimmed, you can customize it so it's fully lit the whole time, and have the dimmed watch face completely different from the actual watch face... if that makes sense. Just buy it.
title: Awesome!

author: mekayla snyder
comment: I love this app. There's endless customization, the face is very clean, and it works flawlessly on my LG G watch R. The only thing I wish would be an option would be seconds displaying on the dim. I'm an EMT and rely on the seconds feature a lot and occasionally it dims while I need them. It's still the best face app that's out there
title: It's the best free app there is.

author: Ian Davenport
comment: Excellent app, thanks! Some options for larger date text and maybe an indicator for phone battery life would be useful for the future...
title: Great!

author: Blue Matrix
comment: Hi, how do I choose photo from gallery since it doesn't support from external storage?  But default location is from external storage. Thanks

reply.author: CORE TECHNOLOGY
reply.content: Make directory "battery" in your external storage or Internal storage and then try again.

title: Picture

author: Michael Arnold
comment: If I change the dimmed color to dark gray it goes whatever it is say the clock becomes invisible
title: I've noticed

author: Red Devil
comment: Really liking this on my LG G Watch. Suits my needs perfectly and doesn't sap the battery. Many thanks. Updated to the premium version,  but fear that the additional colours will kill the battery faster? Worth paying for the update even if it's just as a thanks to the programmer.
title: Great

author: Grant Benson
comment: I really wish I could make the meter go the other way (clockwise instead of CCW), but it looks good aside from that.
title: Nice and simple.

author: Darren Cassidy
comment: My favourite watch face so far. Looks good on my LG G watch.
title: Great watch face

comment: This has now replaced the Nexus face as my standard watch face.  mainly because it has the date and battery life on it.. looks nice.  I would like to be able to control the sleep mode display a little better..  Personally i would prefer the all the elements to drop down to a darkish grey but it would be even better if we could set the colours for sleep mode in the same way you set the colours when viewing it.
title: Great watchface but would like better sleep mode options

author: Charlie Rappa
comment: Have indicator start at left of bottom black bar and end on right side so it is never obscured. Also leave existing style for square watches or better yet make a square stroke version
title: Still needs readjustment for 360

author: William Penney
comment: Simple and clean. Love the ability to customize, would also like to be able to increase the font size for date. One of my favorite so far.
title: Nice

author: Lionel Benson
comment: Add optional 'seconds' in smaller font then I'll give you 6*  :) . Update: Wow, seconds added. Thanks ****** :-)
title: Simple yet elegant.

author: Tomas D.
comment: A+ Great job and free with no special permissions needed.
title: Awesome Wear Watch Face!

author: Jake Kinsella
comment: Notifications take up too much room and you sometimes cannot read them.

author: Luke Mahoney
comment: I like that I can customize all the colours.
title: Good stuff!

author: Ross Peden
comment: Works well
